mcq.statement: What was the original point in the Muslim League's constitution that was replaced on Jinnah's suggestion?

options.a: To promote sense of loyalty in Muslims towards British Government

mcq.one_liner: The original point in the Muslim League's constitution, 'To promote sense of loyalty in Muslims towards British Government,' was replaced on Jinnah's suggestion.

suggestions.topic: Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
